mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tab_simcards (simcard_status, is_del, description, simcard_name, simcard_sim, simcard_dataFlow, simcard_dueDate, simcard_createTime,simcard_updateTime, simcard_operator) VALUES (#{status.code}, #{deleteStatus.code}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name}, #{sim}, #{dataFlow}, #{dueDate}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{operator.code})
mapper.update: UPDATE tab_simcards SET simcard_status=#{status.code}, description=#{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, simcard_sim=#{sim}, simcard_name=#{name}, simcard_dataFlow=#{dataFlow}, simcard_dueDate=#{dueDate}, simcard_operator=#{operator.code}, simcard_updateTime=#{updateTime} WHERE simcard_sno=#{id}
